attributes.action: Strip Tony Blair of his knighthood for his part In the iraq war
attributes.additional_details: It is a slap in the face to any surviving veterans or families of members of the armed forces who lost loved ones in the Iraq conflict.
attributes.background: Respect the thousands of dead soldiers who died as a result of his war for oil

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
